dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2121 IS: Repeal REAL ID Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Walsh (for himself, Mr. Begich, and Mr. Tester) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To repeal title II of the REAL ID Act of 2005.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Repeal REAL ID Act.

section.header: Repeal of title II of the REAL ID Act of 2005
section.text: Title II of the REAL ID Act of 2005 (division B of Public Law 109â€“13; 49 U.S.C. 30301 note) is repealed.
